mapper.select: select t1.*, t6.machine_id, t6.code channelCode, t6.volume_count, t6.goods_count, t6.name channelName, t6.status channelStatus from inno72_goods t1 left join inno72_activity_plan_goods t2 on t1.id=t2.goods_id left join inno72_activity_plan t3 on t2.activity_plan_id=t3.id left join inno72_activity_plan_machine t4 on t3.id=t4.activity_plan_id left join inno72_machine t5 on t4.machine_id = t5.id left join inno72_supply_channel t6 on t5.id=t6.machine_id left join inno72_check_user_machine t7 on t5.id=t7.machine_id left join inno72_supply_channel_goods t8 on t6.id=t8.supply_channel_id where t7.check_user_id=#{checkUserId} and t1.id=t8.goods_id and t5.machine_status=4

select t1.* from inno72_goods t1 left join inno72_activity_plan_goods t2 on t1.id=t2.goods_id left join inno72_activity_plan t3 on t2.activity_plan_id=t3.id left join inno72_activity_plan_machine t4 on t3.id=t4.activity_plan_id left join inno72_machine t5 on t4.machine_id = t5.id where t5.id=#{machineId} and now() BETWEEN t3.start_time and t3.end_time
